vocabInfos.mediumDef:
A man living at the time of United Monarchy, only mentioned at 2Sa.23.33;
father of: Ahiam (H0279); also called Sachar (KJV: Sacar; NIV: Sakar) at 1Ch.11.35;
Also named: sa.khar (שָׂכָר "Sachar" H7940H)
§ Sharar = "enemy"
father of Ahiam, one of David's mighty warriors
vocabInfos._es_Definition: padre de Ahiam, guerrero, en tiempos del rey David
vocabInfos._zh_tw_Definition:
沙拉 这个陽性專有名詞 人名在希伯來文的意思是 "敵人"
大衛王的大能勇士亞希暗的父親 #撒下 23:33|
vocabInfos._zh_Definition:
沙拉 这个阳性专有名词 人名在希伯来文的意思是 "敌人"
大卫王的大能勇士亚希暗的父亲 #撒下 23:33|
